item.title: 96 Great Titchfield street w1, 20th July
item.description:
Bags for collection by first mile now seem to be left on show for days , no other businesses or residents are allowed do this , can WCC address this is issue and ask the business to leave bags out the same day of collection,I hope the business will understand it would not be allowed in any other street . Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 96, Great Titchfield Street, Fitzrovia, Camden Town, City of Westminster
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 5th time within a week fire in metal barrels by non residents, 20th July
item.description:
This is relentless and it happens almost every day! Even with windows closed all we breath in is smoke and smell of burnt meat! This is very polluting directly to us and in general. Two days ago the fire and grilling lasted for 7!!!!!! Hours

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Wick Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
